Method Detail

toIntArray

public static final int[] toIntArray(weka.core.Instance x,
                                     int L)
Convert Instance to bit array. Returns the labels of this instance as an int array relevance representation.

calibrateThreshold

public static double calibrateThreshold(ArrayList<double[]> Y,
                                        double LC_train)
Calibrate a threshold. Based upon a supplied label cardinality from the training set.

calibrateThresholds

public static double[] calibrateThresholds(ArrayList<double[]> Y,
                                           double[] LC_train)
Calibrate thresholds. One threshold for each label, based on training-set label cardinality. Assumes that each double[] in Y is of length LC_train.length;

evaluateMultiLabel

public static HashMap<String,Double> evaluateMultiLabel(ArrayList<double[]> Distributions,
                                                        ArrayList<int[]> TrueRelevances,
                                                        double t)
Calculate Performance Measures. Given a threshold t on a batch of predicted Distributions and their corresponding TrueRelevances. (Rankings.size() must equal Actuals.size()).

calcLogLoss

public static double calcLogLoss(double R,
                                 double P,
                                 double C)
Calculate Log Loss. See Jesse Read. Scalable Multi-label Classification. PhD thesis, University of Waikato, 2010.
